author: djh
msg: Fix 'svn commit -F A\B\C' (paths use \ rather than / on Windows) so
that the file path is translated before being passed to the APIs.
(main) Add a missing call to svn_path_internal_style so that the
log message file can be recognized as versioned and a warning

author: brane
msg: Allow building with either the 0.9 branch or the trunk of apr and apr-util.
recognizing apr and apr-util HEAD, which identify themselves as
version 1.0.0. Pass these to SVN_LIB_APR and SVN_LIB_APRUTIL.

author: djh
msg: Change the test suite to expect local path separators instead of
tweaking the results to always have '/' separators; Subversion is now
using and outputting local path separators almost everywhere and some of
the tests were breaking on Windows. Most of this patch is removing
Remove tweaks and distinguish between local paths and urls.
After building the test url by appending a local path,
change '\' to '/' if we're on Windows.
Diffs are one place where we still use '/' all
the time, so it needs a slight tweak if running on Windows.
This tweak should be removed when/if diffs are changed to use
Build the test paths using local path separators and make sure
For Python 2.0 compatibility, change var.replace calls to

author: kellin
msg: Mandrake RPM build system changelog encompasses changes from
(added entries): Added entries describing the current changes. More
data will follow on modifications made and the options available in the
Context sensitivie patches for build process to sync with Mandrake reqs.
Mika, Cedric, Patrick and others have been working diligently on this
one. I have included it for further testing and to make the javahl RPM
available for further testing by other parties. This patch will disappear
as soon as Patrick has committed the javahl patch.
